CardTerminalFactory for PCSC card terminals.

Author:
Stephan Breideneich (sbreiden@de.ibm.com)
Modified by Jean-Francois.GREZES-EXTERNAL@gemplus.com (Tue, 6 Mar 2001) to allow spaces in PC/SC reader labels (using tag).
